author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-5386: ThreadPoolBuilder and <threadPool> can now create scheduled thread pools.

author: kkolinko
msg: Modify JspC to extend o.a.tools.ant.Task so it works with namespaces
The main change is that execute() no longer throws JasperException so it matches the signature for Task.execute(). This required a small change to main()

author: kkolinko
msg: Align Ant tasks definitions in *.tasks files and in antlib.xml files.
Some tasks were defined only in one of them.
